description.en:
For Atari enthousiasts in Europe, there are some big and several smaller events to attend.
 
 * Wapniak: Demo party (Poland) [ended]
 * Fujima: Gathering (Germany) [ended]
 * Silly Venture: Demo party (Poland) [8 to 10 December)]
And there are plenty of others. See http://demoparty.net and http://pouet.net for releases.
